ValidationRule.description: Outcome / Description is required to update Status from Define to Design
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( Product_Specification__r.RecordType.DeveloperName='CCE_Program_Specification', ISCHANGED( Product_Request_Status__c ), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Product_Request_Status__c ), 'Define'), ISPICKVAL( Product_Request_Status__c, 'Design'), ISBLANK( Outcome_Description__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Outcome / Description" is required to update the Product Request Status.
